See? You're doing it now. Getting all judgey about how other people use social media. I'd say more but... nah.
Because you want to know so badly. And I'm super withholding.
I use FB for advertising. I use Twitter for mental debris. And yet, I'll never actually post what I'm really thinking. Why? (cont'd)...

Add cooked, sliced meat if desired. Add greens/veg as desired. Boom. Phomen. You're welcome. #cooking #ramen #pho #noodles #foodie
...strain out floaties. Add 1 spoon of white or red miso. Add small handful of chopped green onion. Pour over cooked ramen or rice noodles.
2 onions, halved. 1 star anise. 1 small knob ginger. 1 beef or pork bone. 1/4 cup soy sauce. 4 cups water. 1tsp sesame oil. Combine & simmer
Phomen broth recipe to follow. Combo of flavours from classic Pho and Ramen. Prepare for awesome.

@halafae123 you can also make an infusion spray out of it and spray it around doors and windows. It's an oldschool remedy for spidey-control
@halafae123 TANSY!!! Get tansy flowers and put them in cupboards, under beds, in drawers, etc. It's more of a deterrent - they hate tansy.
